functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am managing events through the newcomers website, I want to ensure accurate registration and payment processing, so I can effectively communicate with attendees and avoid confusion.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website and phone app for event registration and management.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Conflicting information between the phone app and the actual registration log, complicated event management processes, and inadequate training for new committee members.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless registration process that provides clear information and reduces user errors.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can register without confusion, and administrators can easily verify registrations.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to find out about upcoming events, I want to easily access and navigate the website, so I can plan my schedule and contact friends.
functional_jobs.pain_points: The event descriptions can be unclear, and the phone app is underpowered.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A clear and intuitive interface on both the website and phone app that provides accurate event information.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can quickly find and understand event details without needing additional help.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am involved in event planning, I want to have a reliable way to archive and pass on information, so I can ensure continuity and efficiency with future events.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Current informal methods of communication and memory.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Lack of formalized institutional memory leads to loss of valuable information and processes.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A structured way to document and share event planning processes and outcomes.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: New committee members can access historical data and learn from past events easily.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I am using the newcomers website, I want to feel confident in my ability to navigate it, so I can enjoy my involvement without frustration.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Utilizing the website and phone app.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Frustration with technical issues and lack of clarity in navigation.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A user-friendly experience that instills confidence in using the platform.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Users express satisfaction with the website's usability and feel empowered to engage with it.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When attending events, I want to feel included and recognized, so I can build connections with other members.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using printed name tags for events.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Handwritten name tags can indicate registration issues and may exclude some members from feeling welcome.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Printed name tags that visually signify attendance and roles within the organization.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: All attendees have professional name tags, and the atmosphere feels inclusive.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and knowledgeable member, so I can establish a good reputation within the community.
social_jobs.current_solution: Active involvement in committees and events.
social_jobs.pain_points: Lack of recognition for the contributions made by knowledgeable members.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Recognition and respect from peers for my active participation and contributions.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Peers acknowledge my efforts and seek my input in future events.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend newcomers events, I want to be seen as a valuable resource, so I can foster relationships and network effectively.
social_jobs.current_solution: Engaging with other members at events.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in establishing connections due to unclear attendee information.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: An environment where networking is easy and facilitated by clear identification of members.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Increased interactions and collaborations among members during events.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I am planning for events, I want to have effective training resources, so I can maximize my contribution as a committee member.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Current training sessions that are often inadequate.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Training sessions do not equip new members with necessary skills and knowledge.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Comprehensive training that prepares members for their roles effectively.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: New members feel confident and capable in their roles after training.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I need to organize events, I want access to a dedicated technical support person, so I can focus on creative aspects instead of technical difficulties.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Reliance on volunteers and committee members for technical support.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Lack of availability of knowledgeable support leads to inefficiencies during event planning.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Access to a technical expert who can assist with website and event management issues.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Event planning processes run smoothly with technical support readily available.
